import React, {useContext} from 'react' import './ProductDisplay.css' import star_icon from '../Assets/star_icon.png' import star_dull_icon from '../Assets/star_dull_icon.png' import { ShopContext } from '../../Context/ShopContext' const ProductDisplay = (props) => { const {product} = props; const {addToCart} = useContext(ShopContext) return (

{product.name}

(122)

${product.old_price}
${product.new_price}
Premium cotton fabric for comfort and durability, Classic button-down collar for a polished look, Tailored fit for a flattering silhouette, Versatile design suitable for various occasions, Available in multiple colors and sizes.

Select Size

S
M
L
XL
XXL

Category : Women, T-Shirt, Crop Top

Tags : Modern, Latest

) } export default ProductDisplay
